title: The currents whisper secrets, traveler, secrets
description: The currents whisper secrets, traveler, secrets only the water remembers. Your path leads to a place of serene beauty, known simply as Beach Location. It is there, upon its tranquil shores, that you must perform a ritual as ancient as the tides themselves. Take up the flat stones you find there and skip stones on water. Do not underestimate this task; the ripples you create, the way they dance and vanish, holds a key to what lies beneath the surface, a truth that seeks to be unveiled by the gentle disturbance of the calm. Seek the true pattern, and the water will reveal its purpose.

trailLocation.title: Beach Location
trailLocation.description: A beautiful beach perfect for relaxation and water activities.
